name: Launch Damage Console
author: Yz8naH0UqWS3uLwh
command:
new game.gmtoolkit.damage.launch().render(true)

/* ==========
 * MACRO: Launch Damage Console
 * VERSION: 6.0.0

 * DESCRIPTION: Quickly deal damage to multiple actors

 ========== */
